resources.string: The following packages will be updated:
Internet access is required to install language pairs.
Install language pairs to translate without Internet access.
Speech output isn\'t available for this language
Speech output isn\'t available for this language without Internet access
Speech input isn\'t available for this language
Speech input isn\'t available without Internet access
Camera input isn\'t available for this language
The app will be restarted to apply the changes.
Enable beta language pairs (translation quality might be poor)
Automatically speak translated text in microphone mode
Automatically check for updates for your language pairs
Check for updates for your language pairs
All the language pairs downloaded for offline use will be uninstalled.
Use signature verification to protect from code injection attacks
Save files for OCR debugging in external storage
License details for open source software
Details about institutions funding the project
Project supported by the Basque Government under the IKT 2014 financial aid
Internet access is required to update language pairs.
Touch target size must be a number less than or equal to 48
Number must be greater than or equal to 0

Arabic Translator is a app using RecyclerView, like Android\'s built-in fast scroll option for ListView.

Minimum System Requirement - Jelly Bean - 4.1.x - API level 16

Developed by Name
Twitter   Google+   Facebook   LinkedIn
